problem_text_cn: 如图,在▱ABCD中,AB=6,BC=10,E为AD上一点,且BE=BC,CE=CD,则DE等于()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in ▱ABCD, AB = N_0, BC = N_1, E is the previous point of AD, and BE = BC, CE = CD, then DE is equal to ()
raw_answer: 解:如图所示:∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴BC=AD=10,AD∥BC,CD=AB=6,∴∠2=∠3,∵BE=BC,CE=CD,∴BE=BC=10,CE=CD=6,∠1=∠2,∠3=∠D,∴∠1=∠2=∠3=∠D,∴△BCE∽△CDE,∴\frac{BC}{CD}=\frac{CE}{DE},即\frac{10}{6}=\frac{6}{DE},解得:DE=3.6．故选:C．
raw_comment: 本题考查的是相似三角形的判定与性质及平行四边形的性质,根据题意得出△BCE∽△CDE是解答此题的关键．
